It provides primitive display progress.

Imports

../thirdparty/opengl, ../core/vector2, ../core/rect2, ../core/anchor, ../core/input, ../core/color, ../core/enums, ../nodes/node, ../nodes/canvas, control

Types

ProgressBarType {...}{.pure.} = enum
  PROGRESS_BAR_HORIZONTAL, PROGRESS_BAR_VERTICAL, PROGRESS_BAR_CIRCLE
ProgressBarObj = object of ControlRef
  max_value*, value*: float
  progress_color*: ColorRef
  indeterminate_val*: float
  indeterminate*: bool
  progress_type*: ProgressBarType

ProgressBarRef = ref ProgressBarObj

Procs

proc ProgressBar(name: string = "ProgressBar"): ProgressBarRef {...}{.raises: [], tags: [].}

Creates a new ProgressBar.

Arguments:

  • name is a node name.

Examples:

var p = ProgressBar("ProgressBar")
